content.rendered:
Patents

Revelle Aesthetics is committed to protecting its innovations through its effort in securing patent protection in the United States and other territories internationally.

Virtual Patent Marking

Pursuant to 35 U.S.C. § 287(a) regarding patent law, the following provides notice of Revelle Aesthetics’ rights in the below identified United States Patents, and their foreign counterparts, and are listed in relation to the product name. Additional U.S. and Non-U.S. patent applications may be pending.

The following list is not exhaustive, and other components not listed here may be protected by one or more patents in the United States and elsewhere. Components of the item listed below may be sold individually or as part of a combination product. Other components not listed herein may have patent markings placed on the particular product or packaging to provide adequate notice of its patent protection.

 Avéli® Precision Cellulite Release Device

United States Patents 
11013527, 11116888, 11911555, 11974767, 11980388, 12023063, D1013173

International
EP3826558B1, JP7458653, MX414652

Registered Design Nos.
AU202211759, CA215130, MX69971, DM222657

Other U.S. and International patents pending.
